Class AnimationWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • AnimationWindow

  • public class AnimationWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    AnimationWindow.java - Sets up the window to display the animated shapes for the MultiShapeTest program. Handles the timer, placement, and size of the various shapes.
    Version:
    10/16/15
    Author:
    Justin Watts

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationWindow()
      Constructor for the AnimationWindow class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAirplane()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to create and place a new airplane in the window.
      void addBoat()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to create and place a new boat in the window.
      void addClock()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to create and place a new clock in the window.
      void makeVisible()
      Sets the animation window as visible and creates a new window if one has not already been created and hidden.
      void removeAirplane()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to remove the latest airplane from the window.
      void removeBoat()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to remove the latest boat from the window.
      void removeClock()
      Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to remove the latest clock from the window.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationWindow

        public AnimationWindow()
        Constructor for the AnimationWindow class. Sets up the elements of the animation window as well as the timer, placement, and size of the objects being animated.

    • Method Detail

      • makeVisible

        public void makeVisible()
        Sets the animation window as visible and creates a new window if one has not already been created and hidden.

        Sends instructions to ShapeIcon class to create and place a new airplane in the window.
